message_1: If John purchases a book online on January 1st and the delivery time is promised between 5 to 7 business days, what is the latest date that John can expect to receive his book? Assume that weekends and public holidays are not considered business days.
message_2:
If John purchases the book on January 1st, we will start counting business days from January 2nd. Since weekends and public holidays are not considered business days, we will only count weekdays (Monday to Friday).

Here's the breakdown of business days:

1. January 2nd - 1st business day
2. January 3rd - 2nd business day
3. January 4th - 3rd business day
4. January 5th - 4th business day
5. January 8th - 5th business day (skipping the weekend)
6. January 9th - 6th business day
7. January 10th - 7th business day

So, the latest date that John can expect to receive his book is January 10th.
